problems.title: Check Divisibility by Multiple Numbers
problems.description:
Given a number, check its divisibility and print:
- "Divisible by both" if divisible by both 3 and 5
- "Divisible by 3" if divisible by 3 only
- "Divisible by 5" if divisible by 5 only
- "Not divisible" if divisible by neither

Input Format:
Single integer.

Output Format:
Print the appropriate string based on divisibility.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
15

Sample Output
Divisible by both

Sample Input
9

Sample Output
Divisible by 3

Sample Input
25

Sample Output
Divisible by 5

Sample Input
7

Sample Output
Not divisible

Explanation:
Use nested conditions to check divisibility by 3 and 5.
hintsList: Check if divisible by 3 and 5 both first, then check individually, else not divisible.
